author: wn.com
title: 2015 Community Acknowledgement of Research Excellence award (University of Newcastle)
text: ( Source : University of Newcastle ) The award, from Hunter Children 's Research Foundation , recognises initiatives that demonstrate excellence in the community. A world-first initiative, HDHK is a multi-award winning evidence-based obesity
